item.title: When to use a Cache
item.author: Miguel √Ångel
item.description: Short answer Should I use a Cache to solve my current problem? No, but this answer might be wrong because it was cached ;) Cache Optimization Calculator Probability to find data in cache (0-100) Average time to read from Cache (ms). Average time to write to Cache (ms). Average operation time (ms). Expected Average Time using the Cache system (ms) Expected improvement percentage (0-100) function cacheCalculation() { console.
